parse.title: The Unacknowledged Legislators: Ausgewählte Aufsätze zur englischen Literatur

'''The Unacknowledged Legislators: Ausgewählte Aufsätze zur englischen Literatur''' (''...: Selected essays on English literature'') is a German-language book, in the series ''Schweizer anglistische Arbeiten'', 98th volume. The author writes about [[wikipedia:William Shakespeare|Shakespeare]], [[wikipedia:John Milton|Milton]], [[wikipedia:Thomas Hardy|Hardy]], [[wikipedia:D.H. Lawrence|D.H. Lawrence]] and [[J.R.R. Tolkien]].<ref>[http://www.buchfreund.de/productListing.php?used=1&productId=34495221 ''Buchfreund''], as of April 21, 2010.</ref>

''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' is discussed in the essay "The Lord of the Rings: Aktualisierung einer untergehenden Welt" ("The Actualization of a Vanished World"), pp. 202–231.<ref>[[Åke Bertenstam|Bertenstam, Åke]]: ''[http://www.forodrim.org/bibliography/tolklist.html A Chronological Bibliography of Books About Tolkien]''</ref>
